name: Hunted (itch) (PrinceAliSaga)
description:
For our group project, me and my friends needed to make a game for disabled people who couldn't use their hands, that's how this small speech recognition game came to life. You are a security guard on duty and need to use the cameras and your voice to safely guide survivors to the exit before the monster can get to them. Be careful tho, the monster can hunt you too. 

The whole game from the menu to the playing experience is voice-controlled, be sure to check out the rules before playing so that you know which commands are possible and which are not.

Developers

Ali

Luca

Chelsey
